properties.entry: SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.DELIVERY_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = ?
SELECT /**/ COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.ORDER_NO = 1

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A SET A.DELIVERY_TYPE = ?, A.TRANSIT_NO = ? WHERE A.DELIVERY_NO = ? AND A.TRANSIT_NO = ?

INSERT INTO MG_NOTI_ATTACHMENT A ( A.ATTACHMENT_NO , A.REF_NOTI_NO , A.ORIGINAL_NAME , A.SAVED_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.FILE_TYPE , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTI_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.DELIVERY_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.TRANSIT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER A WHERE A.ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.DELIVERY_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.TRANSIT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
